mapper.select: WITH ParticipantCount AS ( SELECT g_ID, COUNT(U_ID) AS gamePatiMemNum FROM squad GROUP BY g_ID ) SELECT g.G_ID AS gID, g.G_TEAMID AS gTeamID, g.G_TITLE AS gTitle, g.G_TAG AS gTag, g.G_CREATEDATE AS gCreatedDate, g.G_TIME AS gTime, g.G_INFO AS gInfo, g.G_MINMEMBER AS gMinMember, g.G_RESDATE AS gResDate, g.G_STATUS AS gStatus, g.T_ID AS tID, g.T_AWAYID AS tAwayID, g.S_ID AS sID, g.S_NUM AS sNum, t.T_NAME AS tName, t.T_LOGO AS tLogo, s.S_NAME AS sName, s.S_REGION AS sRegion, s.S_ADDR AS sAddr, s.S_OWNER AS sOwner, s.S_PHONE AS sPhone, u.U_ID AS uID, u.U_NAME AS comwritename, c.G_COMMENT AS gCommentContent, pc.gamePatiMemNum FROM game g LEFT JOIN team t ON g.T_ID = t.T_ID LEFT JOIN team t2 ON g.T_AWAYID = t2.T_ID LEFT JOIN stadium s ON g.S_ID = s.S_ID LEFT JOIN squad sq ON g.G_ID = sq.G_ID AND g.T_ID = sq.T_ID LEFT JOIN user u ON sq.U_ID = u.U_ID LEFT JOIN ParticipantCount pc ON g.G_ID = pc.g_ID LEFT JOIN comment c ON g.G_ID = c.G_ID WHERE g.G_ID = #{gID};
